title: India’s commitment to SL will continue: Indian HC
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); India’s commitment to the people of Sri Lanka will continue, the High Commission of India states.
In a tweet, the High Commission states that India hopes for political stability and looks forward to working with the Government of Sri Lanka.
Court postpones police request to remove obstacles in Galle Face, to June 2022
Look forward to working with Ranil Wickremesinghe, tweets US Ambassador
